title: Enterprise Identity Integration for AI-Assisted Developer Services: Architecture, Implementation, and Case Study
summary: AI-assisted developer services are increasingly embedded in modern IDEs, yet enterprises must ensure these tools operate within existing identity, access control, and governance requirements. The Model Context Protocol (MCP) enables AI assistants to retrieve structured internal context, but its specification provides only a minimal authorization model and lacks guidance on integrating enterprise SSO.
